title: New: The Neighbourhood – A Little Death
body:
Cali quintet **The Neighbourhood** have had quite a year; from numerous big-time premieres to their own UK tour, the group are sure to have a very successful 2013.

Continuing in their usual effortlessly slick R&B style, their new track _A Little Death_ taken from their upcoming _**Thank You**_ 7″ is bolstered by an added hip-gyrating groove. Telling the story of the regret fueled post-melancholy experienced after a passionless night, there are few bands around at the moment that write with such an unshakeable grasp of pop music.
